Class.remarks: See the for details on registering the remotion.web configuration section.
Class.example:
Setting the resources entry's values in the remotion.web configuration section.
<remotion.web xmlns="http://www.re-motion.org/web/configuration"> <resources root="res" rootPath="AbsoluteWithApplicationRoot" /> <!-- Other configuration section entries. --> </remotion.web>

Root.value: A string specifying a path relative to the application root. Defaults to res.
Root.remarks: Leading and trailing slashes are removed.
